metadata.name: Veeam Backup Database Suspicious Query
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious SQL queries using SQLCmd targeting the Veeam backup databases in order to steal information.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\sqlcmd.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('veeambackup')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('from ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('backuprepositories')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('backups')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('credentials')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hostcreds')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('smbfileshares')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ssh_creds')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vsphereinfo'))))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious SQL queries using SQLCmd targeting the Veeam backup databases in order to steal information.
